desc: Want to learn to code? Want to learn C++? Struggling to follow your lecturer or books and tutorials written for experts?  Youâ€™re not alone.  As a professional C++ developer and former Harvard teaching fellow, I know what you need to know to be a great C++ programmer, and I know how to teach it, one step at a time. I know where people struggle, and why, and how to make it clear. I cover every step of the programming process, including:
title: Jumping into C++
